content: In the third quarter â in the third quarter of 2021, net sales from continuing operations were $89.3 million with net income of $6.4 million or $0.40 per diluted share. Again, the changes on the balance sheet for the third quarter, our receivables decreased by $8.5 million from our 2021 fiscal year-end balance, primarily due to the loss of sales volume with our primary home center customer and as well as lower retail sales volume within the current quarter.
